isosensitivity: Auto/i.ISO/100/200/400/800/1600/3200 (Changeable To 1/3 EV Step)/High Sensitivity Mode (1600-6400)
focallength: f=4.5-108mm (25-600mm in 35mm equiv.)/(28-672mm in 35mm equiv. in video recording)
lens: LEICA DC VARIO-ELMARIT/14 Elements In 10 Groups/(2 Aspherical Lenses/3 Aspherical Surfaces/3 ED Lenses/1 Nano Surface Coating Lens)
focusmodes: Normal/AF Macro/Macro Zoom/MF/Quick AF On/Off (On In Intelligent Auto), Continuous AF (Only For Motion Picture), AF/AE Lock Button, Manual Focus, One Shot AF, AF Area Select, AF Tracking
opticalimagestabilizer: Power O.I.S. (On With Active Mode (Only For Video)/Off)
lcdmonitor: 3.0? Inch (7.5cm) TFT Screen LCD Display (460K Dots)/Field of View
viewfinder: 0.20? Color EVF (202K Pixels equiv.), Field of View
exposuremetering: Program AE, Aperture Priority AE, Shutter Priority AE, Manual
